task_32.description: Place the yellow tissue on top of the blue cup
task_32.initial_setup: The yellow tissue is folded and lying flat on the far right corner. The blue cup is upright on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. A green paper cup is tilted and resting on its side near the left side.
task_32.final_state: The yellow tissue is flat and placed directly on top of the blue cup. The green cup is upright on the far left corner.
